page.title: 04A Working mother in Fulford
page.content: 7.45am. Get up, wash, wake up children 8.00am. Breakfast: cornflakes, coffee. 8.30am. Drive to work (12 miles away). 8.55am. Arrive work.(Soc. Serv. Off.) 11.00am.Visits to people's homes. 12.30am.Back to Off.for lunch.Answer telephone, write letters, reports for court and notes on foster children. 2.30pm. Meeting at Children's Home 1hr 4.00pm. Visit old lady in Old People's Home at Fulford, talk to staff there,telephone her family. 5.00pm. Go home. 5.1opm.Get home. 6.00pm. Cook meal for family. 6.30pm. Eat meal. 7.00pm. Watch television, read paper. 9.00pm. Send children to bed. 9.30pm. Tidy sitting room.Do some paperwork for next day.Sort dirty washing and clean clothes for next day 1o.30pm. Bath. 11.00pm. Go to bed.
